snippet: As new federal standards intended to make school food more healthful and nutritious go into effect, changes are already under way in many districts.
abstract: School chefs, food service workers and nutrition experts gather in Denver at annual School Nutrition Association conference, a nonprofit organization of school food professionals; as new federal standards intended to make school food more healthful and nutritious go into effect, changes are already under way in many districts.
lead_paragraph: As new federal standards intended to make school food more healthful and nutritious go into effect, changes are already under way in many districts.

headline.seo: School Menus Get a Fresh Look
headline.main: A Fresh Look at What School Menus Can Be
headline.print_headline: A Fresh Look at What School Menus Can Be
